text: walmwmnwn walmuminat biallah warasulih bedhm 'ansar bed, yamurun alnaas bial'iiman waleamal alsalh, wynhwnhm ean alkufr walmeasy, wywdwn alslat, wyetwn alzkat, wayutieun allah wrswlh, wynthwn eamaa nuhu enh, 'uwlayik sayarhamuhum allah fynqdhhm min eadhabah wayudkhiluhum jnth. 'iina allah eaziz fi mlkh, hakim fi tshryeath wahkamh
